task.title: Request a Floating License from a TCP License Server

context.p: Use this procedure if your company uses a TCP license server:

step.cmd: Contact your server administrator to get network address and login details for the license server.

Go to Help Register
and click the Register button.
step.stepresult: The license registration dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Choose Use a license server as licensing method.
Select TCP server as server type.
In the Host field enter the host name or IP address of the license server.
In the Port field enter the port number used to communicate with the license server.

taskbody.result: If a floating license is available, it is registered in . To display the license details, open the About dialog box from the Help menu. If a floating license is not available, you will get a message listing the users currently using floating licenses.
